//buildsampledata // Use or operation of this code is subject to acceptance of the license available in the code repository for this code.
write !, "This is the setup routine for the SampleData sample, which provides" write !, "several persistent classes with data." write !
write !, "Please specify the directory that contains the SampleData sample." write !, "(This is the directory that contains the /buildsample, /cls, and gbl subdirectories.)", ! read stagingroot
if $ZSTRIP(stagingroot,"<>W")="" { write !, "Not a valid directory... Quitting." quit } if '##class(%File).Exists(stagingroot) { write !, "Not a valid directory... Quitting." quit }
write !, "Loading and compiling classes..." set dir=stagingroot_"/cls/" do $system.OBJ.LoadDir(dir,"ck",,1)
write !, "Loading data..." set file=stagingroot_"/gbl/EmployeePictures.xml" do $system.OBJ.Load(file)
write !, "Running the Sample.Utils::Generate() method..." do ##class(Sample.Utils).Generate()
write !, "Now the classes and data are available. The SQL package name is Sample." write !, "Try SQL queries in the Management Portal or in the SQL shell." write !, "To access the SQL shell, enter: do $system.SQL.Shell()" write !, "Sample query: SELECT * from Sample.Person" write !, "See the documentation for more information."
